Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ProfessorManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.ObservableSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ProfessorManager
public class ProfessorManager extends ObservableSubject
Manages professors ownership and acquisition

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfessorManager

      public ProfessorManager()
      Constructor which initialize every professor as not owned and set the strategy to evaluate acquisitions as standard

  • Method Details

    • getMaxStudentsOf

      public int getMaxStudentsOf(Color color)
      gets the number of students in the dining room of the owner of the professor of the specified color. If the professor is not owned by anyone it returns 0.
      Parameters:
      color - specifies the color of students and professor.
      Returns:
      a number between 0 and 10 corresponding to the number of students in the dining room of the owner of the professor of the specified color.

    • resetComparator

      public void resetComparator()
      Sets the standard comparator used to compare the number of students of the current player with the owner of professors. The standard comparator's compare(x,y) return 1 if x>y, 0 otherwise.

    • setComparator

      public void setComparator(Comparator<Integer> comparator)
      Changes the comparator used to compare the number of students of the current player with the owner of professors.
      Parameters:
      comparator - specifies which comparator to set.

    • canTakeProfessor

      public boolean canTakeProfessor(Player player, Color color)
      Tells if the specified player can take control of the professor of the specified color using the set comparator.
      Parameters:
      player - specify which player to evaluate
      color - specify the color of the professor to evaluate
      Returns:
      true if they the player can take control of the professor, false if they the player can not take control of the professor

    • takeProfessor

      public void takeProfessor(Player player, Color color)
      Sets the specified player as the owner of the professor of the specified color and update the maximum number of students of that color
      Parameters:
      player - the player to set as the owner
      color - the color of the professor

    • getProfessorsOwnedBy

      public List<Color> getProfessorsOwnedBy(Player player)
      Returns the list of the colors of the professors owned by the specified player
      Parameters:
      player - the player to evaluate
      Returns:
      a list of Color corresponding to the owned professors

    • ownerOf

      public Player ownerOf(Color color)
      Gets the player who owns the professor of a specified color
      Parameters:
      color - color of the professor of which you get the owner
      Returns:
      The Player who owns the professor
